sections.content:
Ever been on Youtube, Wikipedia or Github? You browse something interesting start reading about it then you read some more. Then you find a link and read more and more. WHOA! Where did the time go?
That's what we were aiming for when we created Developers Hangout. A place to explore other people's projects, see what they have made, and maybe make a connection and help out?

Maybe you're looking for other developers to help you out with a project or similar?

As a developer, showing off your skills can help you in many ways.

  • Improve your basic skills
  • Land a job
  • Get feedback for a project
  • Further develop a project
  • Get new friends just by showing off what you know

    When you showcase your skills to others, the possibilities are endless!
    In Developers Hangout, use your profile to let your skills shine and show others EXACTLY what you’re good at.

Are you a lonesome developer? Sitting at work or maybe in your own room typing away the code?
Do you wish that you could meet fellow developers instead of hundreds of Facebook groups and LinkedIn Groups?
Well Developers Hangout have ya covered, its a community made by a developer for other developers!
Register today to get to know other developres and connect!
